location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 465/1939 'Basra Petroleum Company: possibility of a pipeline through Kuwait territory'

physicalDescription.extent: This file consists of a single document.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter to Trenchard Craven Fowle, Political Resident, Persian Gulf, from Gerald Simpson de Gaury, Political Agency, Kuwait, requesting advice regarding the possible piping of oil through Kuwait territory by the Basra Petroleum Company.
